title: The Cru
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Organic, Raw, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, European, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Located close to Lisbon. Serves around 90% raw food. Over 50% of the menu is vegan. Food consists mainly of wraps, salads, juices, smoothies, coconut water, wheat grass shots, in addition to desserts such as chia pudding, granola, acai and raw brownies. Uses organic ingredients. Offers gluten-free items and labels them. Doesn't use refined sugar. Doesn't serve alcohol.
streetAddress: Avenida Antonio Bernardo Cabral de Macedo, Piso 0
